alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 06 at 3:31PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Humboldt, northern Lander and western Elko Counties through 415 PM PDT... At 331 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Valmy, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Humboldt, northern Lander and western Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
